name: Motor Speed Racing
description:
The COOLEST city motor racing game is coming! ! !
Gorgeous and realistic design of the motor model! ! !
You are sporty guys
You like sports games
Your favorite is motor speed racing
You like high speed
You like racing, rally motor speed on highway
This is very basic of motor racing game style.
* HOW TO PLAY
This game is very easy to play, just swing your device to control your motor avoid others on the road
Gain car racing, rally high score. From racing highway road, collecting coins to gain more high score
Let's enjoy motor high speed now
